contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=February 2007}} {{Infobox rugby team | teamname = Queensland Country Heelers | image = | union = [[Queensland Rugby Union]] | location = [[Queensland]], [[Australia]] | countryflag = | founded = 2000 | region = Rural [[Queensland]] | ground = Regional Centres | capacity = n/a | coach = [[Glenn Panoho]] | captain = n/a | league = [[Australian Rugby Shield]] | season = n/a | position = n/a | pattern_la2=|pattern_b2=|pattern_ra2=|pattern_so2=|pattern_sh2= | leftarm2=|body2=|rightarm2=|shorts2=|socks2=| }} The '''Queensland Country Heelers''' are the team representing [[Queensland Country Rugby Union|Queensland Country]] in the [[Australian Rugby Shield]] competition. As such, the team draws on players from clubs taking part in the [[Queensland Country Championship]] and [[Queensland Outback Championship]]. Clubs taking part in Queensland's more highly regarded competitions [[Queensland Premier Rugby|Queensland Premier]] and [[Brisbane Club Rugby]], are represented by the [[Queensland Reds]]. ==Format== ===Franchise area=== *'''Queensland Country Championship''' **[[Cairns]] **[[Townsville]] **[[Rockhampton]] **[[Sunshine Coast, Queensland|Sunshine Coast]] **[[Gold Coast, Queensland|Gold Coast]] **[[Darling Downs, Queensland|Darling Downs]] *'''Queensland Outback Championship''' **[[Longreach, Queensland|Western Queensland]] **[[Mount Isa]] **[[Emerald, Queensland|Central Highlands]] **[[St. George, Queensland|Western Downs]] *'''Suspended from competition''' **[[Mackay, Queensland|Mackay]] **[[Bundaberg]] ==See also== * [[Queensland Rugby Union]] * [[Australian Rugby Shield]] * [[Rugby union in Australia]] {{QRU}} {{Rugby_union_in_Australia}} [[Category:Rugby union teams in Queensland]] [[Category:Rugby clubs established in 2000]] [[Category:2000 establishments in Australia]] {{Australia-rugbyunion-team-stub}}
